head: Kate Price remembers something terrible
blurb: An authority on child sex trafficking, she spent decades trying to understand whether the unthinkable happened to her, too.

head: Explore each of David Ortiz’s 558 career home runs
blurb: Red Sox legend David Ortiz is headed to the Hall of Fame. Explore all of the 558 career home runs that helped get him there.

head: In harm’s way
blurb: Vehicle rammings against protesters are on the rise, but the justice system often sides with drivers.

head: Brad Marchand and the art of the shorthanded goal
blurb: The Bruins’ scrappy left wing has a knack for turning an opponent’s power play into a disadvantage.

head: How would you rebuild the Patriots?
blurb: With ample cap space and the No. 15 draft pick, which players would you add while staying below the salary cap?

head: Swish 41
blurb: Twenty-one years, over 26,000 shots. Tour every dunk, layup, 3-pointer and, of course, fadeaway jumper that make up Dirk Nowitzki’s career.

head: Pain & profit
blurb: Your tax money may not help poor, sick Texans get well, but it definitely helps health care companies get rich.

head: Redistricting redux
blurb: In 2018, the U.S. Supreme Court was to decide whether Texas needed to re-draw electoral maps to give minority voters and equal voice. See how the Dallas-Fort Worth area would be affected.

head: Standoff
blurb: The inside story of the night of July 7, 2016, when a small group of elite cops squared off inside El Centro College with a gunman who had just killed five of their fellow officers.

head: It’s history now
blurb: The images caputred on July 7, 2016 and the days that followed revive memories for those at the center of the ambush that killed five officers.

head: The weight of a wall
blurb: Voices from the desert near El Paso to the fertile valley at the tip of Texas wrestle with a ‘a big, beautiful, powerful wall’ through the borderland.

head: Tony Romo's career, visualized
blurb: Tour Tony Romo’s career, all 4,520 regular and postseason pass attempts. See every completion, touchdown, interception and player who caught a pass from the Cowboys quarterback (including himself).

head: Kings of the clutch
blurb: The Texas Rangers are American League West champions thanks in part to a historic win-rate in one-run games. That success wasn’t just luck.
